name: Crate Smash
description:
You play as the crate that people have long since abused in games but this time you're the one getting smashed.

Try and avoid the robot who has become sick of working in the factory and now wants to crush you. There are electric traps in the ground which will disable the robot but more will come see how long you can survive while also avoding the fire and falling off the platform.

Controls

Dodge - Space

Move Up - W

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Move Down - S
